Package edu.ucsb.cs56.games.client_server.v2.client.Views

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChatViewPanel
    Chat panel used in client
    ClientViewPanel
    Main Client Panel
    GameViewPanel
    Game panel is a largely abstract panel that provides an outline for how panels should be formatted, as well as provides basic functions every panel should have.
    OfflineViewPanel
    offline panel provides two textfields for IP address and port, and a connect button if the ip and port combination are invalid, it'll stall for a few seconds while it times out in the future, i'd like to have a thread do this, so the gui doesn't freeze with the connect button clicked
    OnlineViewPanel
    The lobby panel is a panel which displays currently available games which, when clicked on, will take the user to a new or in-progress copy of that game.
    TicTacToeViewPanel
    tictactoepanel allows user to interface with server while playing tic tac toe game, accepts input and draws board and current player's turn on the screen
    TwoPlayerGameViewPanel
    Two Game Player setup for all basic games
